turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Good afternoon, Example Loans support, you're speaking with Alex. How can I help you today?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Yeah, hi. Your app is saying my repayment failed. But I paid it. I definitely paid it. This is wasting my time.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I'm really sorry for the hassle. Let me check that for you right now. First, I just need to verify your identity. Can I get your full name please?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Thanks Samantha. And can you confirm your date of birth and postcode for me?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Thank you. Alright, I can see here that a payment attempt was rejected by the bank overnight. It looks like it may have been a temporary hold on the bank's side. Do you see a pending transaction showing in your bank account?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Yes, it's showing as pending. But your system sent me this really alarming message saying payment failed. That's not okay—it stressed me out.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: You're absolutely right to raise that, and I apologise for the stress it caused. I'll log some feedback about the wording of those messages. For now, what I can do is place a short grace note on your account so you won't be penalised while the payment clears through.

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Good, do that. And also—stop calling me during my work meetings. Someone called at 10am yesterday and it was really embarrassing. I was presenting to my team.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I completely understand, that's not ideal at all. I can update your contact preferences. What's your preferred contact time, and which number should we use?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Only after 5:30pm. My mobile is 0491 044 120. And email me any confirmations—don't just call.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Sure thing. What email address should I send confirmations to?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Perfect, I've got that down. I've updated your contact preference to after 5:30pm only on your mobile. And I've added a note about the repayment alert wording for our product team.

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Thanks. Look, I was pretty mad when I called. Just... fix the issue and let me know.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Totally fair, Samantha. I'll email you a case reference number and the grace note details within the hour. Is there anything else I can help with today?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: No worries. Thanks for calling and I hope the rest of your day goes smoothly. Take care.
